Package paintingcanvas

Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • paintingcanvas.Canvas
  • public class Canvas
extends java.lang.Object
    The front-end of the Canvas.CanvasComponent class that's more user-friendly and doesn't throw a wall of text at you in the documentation because it extends JComponent or something.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      protected static class  Canvas.CanvasComponent
      The internal canvas component that is used to draw to the screen
